sentences.en: An exceptionally violent cyclone hit the town last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚异常猛烈的旋风吹袭了那个小镇.

sentences.en: As a surgeon, Philip was exceptionally gifted.
sentences.cn: 作为外科医生, 菲利普才华出众.

sentences.en: He had ordered his officers to keep an exceptionally firm hold over their men.
sentences.cn: 他已经命令军官要倍加严格地管住自己的手下。
他是个非常有天赋的舞者。

sentences.en: Her married life was exceptionally happy.
sentences.cn: 她的婚后生活十分幸福.

sentences.en: It remained an exceptionally rare book until it was reprinted in 1918.
sentences.cn: 在1918年再版之前，这本书一直非常罕见。

sentences.en: Phil Martin is an exceptionally busy man.
sentences.cn: 菲尔·马丁整天忙得不可开交。

sentences.en: She sings in an exceptionally pure soprano.
sentences.cn: 她以异常纯美的高音歌唱.
她是名厨艺一流的厨师。

sentences.en: The conditions under ground were exceptionally hot.
The Fragrant Hills are exceptionally beautiful in late autumn.
The location is exceptionally poor, viewed from the sanitation point.
sentences.cn: 从卫生角度来看,这个地段非常糟糕.

sentences.en: The merchandise is reasonably priced and offers exceptionally good value.
sentences.cn: 这些商品定价合理，很是划算。

sentences.en: The weather, even for January, was exceptionally cold.
sentences.cn: 这种天气即使在一月份也算得上非常寒冷。

sentences.en: Though nearly 50, he is exceptionally vigorous in work.
sentences.cn: 别看他快50岁了, 工作却是雷厉风行.
